name: IOUSBHostDevice
desc: A provider object that represents the USB device.

items.name: - Open
items.desc: Opens a session to a host device.

items.name: - Close
items.desc: Closes the session to the host device.

items.name: - Reset
items.desc: Terminates the device and attempts to reenumerate it.

items.name: - CopyCapabilityDescriptors
items.desc: Returns the device’s capability descriptors.

items.name: - CopyConfigurationDescriptor
items.desc: Returns the configuration descriptor with the specified index.

items.name: - CopyConfigurationDescriptor
items.desc: Returns the currently selected configuration descriptor.

items.name: - CopyConfigurationDescriptorWithValue
items.desc: Returns the configuration descriptor with the specified configuration value.

items.name: - CopyDeviceDescriptor
items.desc: Returns the device descriptor.

items.name: - CopyStringDescriptor
items.desc: Returns a string descriptor from the device.

items.name: - CopyStringDescriptor
items.desc: Returns a string descriptor from the device.

items.name: - CopyDescriptor
items.desc: Retrieves any type of descriptor from the cache or the device.

items.name: - DeviceRequest
items.desc: Sends a synchronous request to the device on the default control endpoint.

items.name: - AsyncDeviceRequest
items.desc: Enqueues a request on the default control endpoint of the device.

items.name: - CompleteAsyncDeviceRequest
items.desc: The type definition for an asynchronous device request completion routine.

items.name: - AbortDeviceRequests
items.desc: Aborts device requests that you made previously from the current device client.

items.name: - CreateIOBuffer
items.desc: Allocates a buffer for use during I/O operations.

items.name: - CreateInterfaceIterator
items.desc: Creates an iterator to get the list of interfaces from the device.

items.name: - CopyInterface
items.desc: Gets the next host interface child associated with this device.

items.name: - DestroyInterfaceIterator
items.desc: Destroys an interface iterator that you created.

items.name: - GetAddress
items.desc: Returns the address of the device.

items.name: - GetSpeed
items.desc: Retrieves the device’s operational speed.

items.name: - GetFrameNumber
items.desc: Gets the current frame number of the USB controller.

items.name: - GetPortStatus
items.desc: Returns the current port status of the device.

items.name: - SetConfiguration
items.desc: Selects a new configuration for the device.
